review: Excellent product and a special thanks to The great tech rep who helped in securing the stick. He was patient with me when my blue ray wasn't cutting it. His name was Gregory and tell him thank you.
author: Bob L

review: This is the best $40 I've ever spent!
author: Joshua Sherwood

review: Would not know if we like it or not.  We bought it for our travel trailer.  We travel full time.  No where does it say that firestick won't work with a 2 stage Internet  log in. Well guess what.  Many campgrounds, and most military bases have a 2 stage log in.  Making us rethink going with Google Chrome.
author: Karen Rexford

review: Very cool device works as promised. No problems, simply plug it in and start watching.
author: Michael Aurand

review: We love the Fire TV stick. It makes using Netflix and Amzon Prime Video so user friendly. The apps on the Fire TV are also amazing. There is a good variety of apps available. We adore the cooking apps and use them frequently to try new recipes. The videos are awesome. We just love the fire stick!
author: jandrpopejoy

review: Awesome , Easy to use great games as well.
author: mike s

review: Did exactly what it"s suppose to.
author: Mike, Troy mi

review: The description did not mention, this device has to be plugged into the wall for power. The fire stick will not work unless it is plugged in. My tv is mounted on the wall, the fire stick just hangs there from behind my tv with the cord dangling. If I had known, I had to plug in to the wall, I would not have gotten it, you cannot watch anything with the fire stick unless you have a subscription to Amazon Prime or Netflix.
author: Vutana Ou
